abstract: Beijing is confident a Chinese bid to invest in Anglo-Australian miner Rio Tinto Group will not be hurt by its rejection of Coca-Cola‘s attempt to buy a Chinese juice maker, The Associated Press said, citing comments by a Cabinet official.
lead_paragraph: Beijing is confident a Chinese bid to invest in Anglo-Australian miner Rio Tinto Group will not be hurt by its rejection of Coca-Cola‘s attempt to buy a Chinese juice maker, The Associated Press said, citing comments by a Cabinet official.

headline.main: China Says Coke Case Won’t Hurt Rio Tinto Bid
